com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Scene
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The Scene is a JFrame that will be displayed. It has a ScenePaint that is the JPanel that the Space and GUI will be drawn on.
    The ScenePainter is what will draw on the Paint. It paints the Mesh of the SpaceObjects and so on.
    The GUI is the layer in front of the Space that will draw the Buttons, Images and other GUI stuff.
    The SceneSettings are where the settings of the Scene are stored.
    Author:
    John Konrad Ferraz Salomon - John´s Project
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
